other_title: クリスタル ブレイズ (Japanese)
plot: The stage is the Middle East in a not too far away future: in Rags Town, a city full of scum. A carefree detective named Shun is living in this city, doing what he pleases. But one day he meets a beautiful girl who's lost her memory, and he tries to solve her mystery without knowing that this would change his life and make him face a powerful enemy.
opening_theme: "Never looking back - Sukitōru Kokoro de" (Never looking back 〜透き通る心で) by Rie
ending_theme: "Kokoro yo Kaze ni Nare" (こころよ 風になれ) by TASO (eps 9-12)
